name: 2048 Mobile Merge Logic Game
description:
More than 1,000,000 people already played 2048 Mobile!!! Thanks!

The 2048 Mobile app is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

HOW TO PLAY:
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins!

FEATURES:
+ Share score with your Facebook friends
+ Leaderboard
+ Smooth gameplay
+ Nice animations

Have fun!

2048 Mobile is based on 2048, created by Gabriele Cirulli, which was based on 1024 by Veewo Studio and conceptually similar to Threes by Asher Vollmer.
